title: Opening speech: McLaren = Discours de bienvenue de Norman McLaren
brief_description: An animated film in which Norman McLaren is caught by his own film tricks. He attempts to welcome the audience but is frustrated by a reluctant microphone that has a will of its own. Originally made for the official opening of the Montreal Film Festival. (Awards: London) Contains both French and English dialogue.
